title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 §§ 130-1.5 - Exception
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 §§ 130-1.5 - Exception

State Regulations

This rule shall not apply to requests
for costs or attorneys' fees subject to the provisions of CPLR
8303-a. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
§§
130-1.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
